page.title: 13GADGETS IN NEWTON MEARNS
page.content: {TV}is used every day in our homes. We watch many programs like Dallas and Grange Hill {Videos}When we go out we do not have to worry about missing our favourite programmes because we record them on video recorders. These videos are also usdeful because we can rent out good films from a video library {Radio}Most people have radios in their homes. We listen to music or to people talking. There are many different channels. {Kettle}With a kettle we can boil cold water for tea or coffee. {Record Players} We can play records on a record player. They can be pop or classical music. We prefer the pop songs. {Cooker}There are electric cookers and gas cookers. We are not allowed to use these cookers as they are dangerous.
